column1: Smoque BBQ////This is some of the best BBQ I've ever had. Service was acceptable
column2: food was ready promptly and taste was amazing. We had brisket- soooo tender
column3: baby back ribs- fall-off-the-bone good and charred just right
column4: pulled pork- good but not as amazing as the other two meats
column7: fries-1 order is enough for 2 people and cornbread- very good. Cole slaw is served with everything and it was just okay (it's more of a vinegar based and we prefer creamy type). You cannot go wrong at this place!
